duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a strategic plan to drive sales growth within the organization.
Identify new business opportunities through market research and prospecting activities.
Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers.
Develop and deliver sales presentations and proposals to potential clients.
Negotiate contracts and agreements with clients.
Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure successful implementation of client solutions.
Lead solution definition and scoping to generate technical solutions, estimates, and project implementation approaches.
Present technical topics to senior, technical, and business audiences and C-Levels.
Apply methodology, reusable assets, and previous work experience to deliver consistently high-quality work.
Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
Define/Refine the Go-to-Market strategy for revenue growth of the organization.
Lead or co-lead answers to RFPs issued by clients.
Identify product improvements or new products by remaining current on industry trends, market activities, and competitors.

Maintain professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing professional publications, establishing personal networks, benchmarking state-of-the-art practices, and participating in professional societies.
Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent work experience.
